abstract: Rackable Systems, which sells thousands of servers to Microsoft, Yahoo and others, warns that customers have pulled way back on hardware spending.
snippet: Rackable Systems, which sells thousands of servers to Microsoft, Yahoo and others, warns that customers have pulled way back on hardware spending.
lead_paragraph: The first glimpse at how the economic turmoil is affecting business hardware purchases may have popped up over at Rackable Systems.

headline.main: Server Maker to the Stars Cuts Revenue Forecast
